channel.title: Lunar Eclipse on Juan Orozco
channel.description: Recent content in Lunar Eclipse on Juan Orozco

item.title: Wolf Blood Moon
item.description: In the past ten years, we've seen three total lunar eclipses where 'round these parts. Every time, though, circumstances prevented us from seeing it - clouds, really effing late hours, etc. This, year, though, we had a clear night and it wasn't too late in the evening.
